								({{gridOptions.sortFields['notes']['Count']}}) 
								<md-icon class="md-opacity-55"  md-svg-src="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAngular/src/img/icons/down.svg" ng-if="gridOptions.sortFields['notes']['Order'] == 'ASC'">

								</md-icon>
							</span>
						</div>
						<span ng-if="showSearch" dib-edit>
							<md-input-container aria-label="notes" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4049&text=client_contact' >

							</md-input-container>

				</ng-form>

	<md-content  fill-height footer-element='.dib-grid-footer' class='dib-grid-column-content'>
		<md-list dib-table-column-width >
			<md-list-item ng-if="gridData.length == 0"  layout-align="center center">
				<div class="no-records-available">
					  No records available 
				</div>
			</md-list-item>
			<md-list-item class="md-1-line _md-no-proxy " ng-repeat="row in gridData"  ng-class="{ 'md-custom-accent' : row.___selected, 'first-record-padding' : $index==0 && row.___editing }" ng-click="selectRow(row, $event)"   double-click="rowEdit(element)" >
				<ng-form name='qtClientContactGrid' dib-container-name="qtClientContactGrid" isolate-form layout="row" flex="100" dib-inline-edit="closed" layout-align="start start" ng-enter='saveRow($event,row)' >
					<div table-column layout="column" flex = 'nogrow' dib-column="196370" style="    " >
						<md-button aria-label="btngridedit" can-be-moved=true flex="nogrow" class="md-icon-button  md-squared md-raised" style="    " id='ci196370' aria-label="btngridedit" dib-container-name='qtClientContactGrid' ng-click="common.goTo('qtClientContactForm','',true,'?primary_id='+row.id,'',$event);" dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
							<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
								View/edit record in a form
							</md-tooltip>
							<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAdmin/images/ic_mode_edit_black.svg">
							</md-icon>
						</md-button>
					</div>
					<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="196579" style="    " >
						<div aria-label="id" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4049&text=client_contact' >
							<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
								<span flex data-type="number" >
									<span>
										{{$parent.viewModel['id']}}
									</span>
								</span>
							</div>

					of {{ page.count }} 
				</md-button>
			</div>
			<md-button ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='nextPage()'>
				Next 
			</md-button>
			<md-button  ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='lastPage()'>
				Last 
			</md-button>
		</div>
